Develop international standard web application using ASP.Net MVC, Dot Net Core, Telerik, Entity Framework and SQL Server 2008/2012.
Writing unit test code.

Excellent capability of writing complex SQL queries and objects.

JOB CONTEXT: BRAC IT Services Ltd. (biTS) is an IT Solution and Services company and is a subsidiary jointly owned by BRAC and BRAC Bank. biTS focuses to become the most trustworthy company in Bangladesh providing technology solutions and managing IT Services. biTS provides end-to-end solutions for industries like Banks, Non-Banking Financial Institutes, Educational Institutes, Micro-Finance, NGOs, FMCG etc.
